entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
